name: JoinedSequence.Iterator
desc: An iterator that presents the elements of the sequences traversed by a base iterator, concatenated using a given separator.

items.name: typealias JoinedSequence.Iterator.Element
items.desc: The type of element traversed by the iterator.

items.name: init<Separator>(base: Base.Iterator, separator: Separator)
items.desc: Creates an iterator that presents the elements of base sequences concatenated using separator.

items.name: func next() -> JoinedSequence<Base>.Iterator.Element?
items.desc: Advances to the next element and returns it, or nil if no next element exists.
